subject: Baseball
World Series
Libraries and Librarians
lead_paragraph: The Library of Congress revealed newsreel footage of Game 7 of the 1924 World Series between the Washington Senators and the New York Giants, a day before the Nationals-Giants opener in an N.L. divisional series.
snippet: The Library of Congress revealed newsreel footage of Game 7 of the 1924 World Series between the Washington Senators and the New York Giants, a day before the Nationals-Giants opener in an N.L. divisional series.
